verses.roman:
pūrṇa kumbha lañā āise śata bhakta-gaṇa
śūnya ghaṭa lañā yāya āra śata jana

synonyms: pūrṇa kumbha—a filled waterpot; lañā—taking; āise—come; śata bhakta-gaṇa—hundreds of devotees; śūnya ghaṭa—an empty waterpot; lañā—taking back; yāya—go; āra—another; śata jana—hundreds of men.
translation: Hundreds of devotees brought water in the pots, and hundreds took the empty pots away to fill them up again.
